data.actual_result: You cannot open that DM because it crashes Discord
data.expected_result: You can open the DM and see the bot's embed right away
data.short_description: Receiving rich embed DMs from bots (and presumably users) crashes Discord when opened (I guess this got denied even though everyone can repro it, so thanks everyone)
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a bot that has rich embeds in DMs - invoke a command (not in DMs) that makes said bot DM you a rich embed - Try to open new message
